GSD.description:
block: stop setting the nomerges flags in blk_cleanup_queue

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0 by commit 0e3534022f26ae51f7cf28347a253230604b6f4e. For more details please see the references link.
